name: Fields of Everplast
description:
This is my first platforming and complete game made with Godot Engine. Note that this game is not Everplast. This is the game Everplast was built off of. If you don't have Everplast, you can get it here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1896630/Everplast/

Screenshots:

Images and art assets are not open source. You may not use them in other projects without buying them first. This is a here as a portfolio project. Do not expect this game to be polished. It is just the base of my current game, a game I finished a while ago.

All non-sound assets, scripts, or Godot generated files are under the MIT License.

Source code:

https://github.com/WraithWinterly/Fields-of-Everplast
